Detailed Description

Base class for XML file parser.

Provides validation with XML Schema.

Supports data in file and in memory (QByteArray).

Member Function Documentation

QDomDocument ChParserBase::loadToDom ( const QString &  fileName  )  const [protected]

Loads XML file into QDomDocument object.

No XML Schema validation in this function. Just DOM parsing.

Parameters:
fileName - XML file to load.
Returns:
DOM document.
Exceptions:
ChParserException in case of any file access or parser error.

void ChParserBase::saveFile ( const QString &  fileName,
const QDomDocument &  doc,
const QString &  schemaFileName 
) const [protected]

Saves XML data to file.

Validates XML data in doc using XML Schema schemaFileName before saving to fileName.

Not effective for large files.

Exceptions:
ChParserException in case of any file access or parser error.

void ChParserBase::backupFile ( const QString &  fileName  )  const [protected]

Creates a backup file.

".bak" added to the fileName.

No error reporting.
